MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am due to faulty overhead line equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:51am on Friday, 19 February 2021
